name: Rogue Assembly Line
description:
Rogue Assembly Line is a 2D puzzle platformer game where you control the mechanical objects in a factory, managing a production line of cuddly creatures who you need to see safely through the hazardous levels. 

HELPFUL INFO:

  • To start each level, pull the blinking red switch lever.
  • You can click on certain objects to alter how they function.

CONTRIBUTORS:

GoranBlaze

Automatree

Doubleday

MUSIC:

Jav Cast - Low Soul
